homePage.title: Home
homePage.slogan:
Use European products.
Promote European independence.

scanPage.title: Scan
scanPage.description: Scan the barcode of a product to get more information.

postPage.title: Post
postPage.description: Capture a new product to support the community.
postPage.certify: I certify that this product exists. The device will be blocked in case of spam.

productPage.title: Product
productPage.euHint: We also include Great Britain, Switzerland, etc.

alternativeProductPage.title: Alternative
alternativeProductPage.alternativeQuestion: Is this product a good alternative?

noScanResultPage.title: Scan Result
noScanResultPage.descriptionSub: Do you want to submit a product to help the community?

notEuropeanWarningDialog.title: Warning
notEuropeanWarningDialog.content: This product is not European. Do you still want to add it?

europeanWarningDialog.title: Warning
europeanWarningDialog.content: This product is European. Only non-European products should be added and discussed. Do you want to continue?

changeVoteWarning.title: Change vote
changeVoteWarning.content: Your comment will be deleted if you change your vote. Do you want to continue?

productDeleteDialog.title: Delete product
productDeleteDialog.content: Do you really want to delete this product?
